import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CartContext } from '../context/CartContext'; const Header = () => { const { state } = useContext(CartContext); return (
Sneaker City
Women Men
{state.itemCount} Cart Sign In
); }; export default Header;
